description: Strategic physics-based puzzle where players pop colored balloons using limited darts to clear the grid.
rationale: This game targets puzzle enthusiasts and logic game lovers. It provides a structured environment for AI agents to learn spatial reasoning and trajectory optimization under resource constraints, similar to the classic 'Pooyan' or 'Puzzle Bobble' mechanics but with a static grid-clearing objective.
details: The game features a 10x10 grid where balloons of 4 different colors are randomly placed. The player controls a dart launcher at the bottom center. Balloons of the same color adjacent to each other will pop in a chain reaction if one is hit. The objective is to clear all balloons with a limited number of darts. Physics includes dart trajectory and gravity-affected balloon floating (balloons move up to fill empty spaces after a pop).

game_mechanics.lose_condition: Zero darts remaining with balloons still on grid

how_to_play: Move the launcher left/right using Arrow Keys. Aim the trajectory. Press SPACE to fire a dart. Hit a balloon to trigger a pop. If the popped balloon has neighbors of the same color, they also pop. Score increases exponentially with the size of the chain reaction. Clear the entire board to win.
